_A.description: Library ABIE XML namespace string (for ASBIEs)

TransportExecutionPlanRequest.description: A document sent by a transport user to request a transport service from a transport service provider.

TransportExecutionPlanRequest.title: Transport Execution Plan Request. Details
TransportExecutionPlanRequest.description: A document sent by a transport user to request a transport service from a transport service provider.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

UBLVersionID.title: Transport Execution Plan Request. UBL Version Identifier. Identifier
UBLVersionID.description: Identifies the earliest version of the UBL 2 schema for this document type that defines all of the elements that might be encountered in the current instance.

CustomizationID.title: Transport Execution Plan Request. Customization Identifier. Identifier
CustomizationID.description: Identifies a user-defined customization of UBL for a specific use.

ProfileID.title: Transport Execution Plan Request. Profile Identifier. Identifier
ProfileID.description: Identifies a user-defined profile of the customization of UBL being used.

ProfileExecutionID.title: Transport Execution Plan Request. Profile Execution Identifier. Identifier
ProfileExecutionID.description: Identifies an instance of executing a profile, to associate all transactions in a collaboration.

ID.title: Transport Execution Plan Request. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this document, assigned by the sender.

VersionID.title: Transport Execution Plan Request. Version. Identifier
VersionID.description: An identifier for the current version of the Transport Execution Plan Request.

CopyIndicator.title: Transport Execution Plan Request. Copy_ Indicator. Indicator
CopyIndicator.description: Indicates whether this document is a copy (true) or not (false).

UUID.title: Transport Execution Plan Request. UUID. Identifier
UUID.description: A universally unique identifier for an instance of this document.

IssueDate.title: Transport Execution Plan Request. Issue Date. Date
IssueDate.description: The date, assigned by the sender, on which this document was issued.

IssueTime.title: Transport Execution Plan Request. Issue Time. Time
IssueTime.description: The time, assigned by the sender, at which this document was issued.

DocumentStatusCode.title: Transport Execution Plan Request. Document Status Code. Code
DocumentStatusCode.description: A code signifying the status of the Transport Execution Plan Request.

DocumentStatusReasonCode.title: Transport Execution Plan Request. Document Status Reason Code. Code
DocumentStatusReasonCode.description: A code signifying a reason associated with the status of the Transport Execution Plan Request.

DocumentStatusReasonDescription.title: Transport Execution Plan Request. Document Status Reason Description. Text
DocumentStatusReasonDescription.description: A reason associated with the status of the Transport Execution Plan Request.

Note.title: Transport Execution Plan Request. Note. Text
Note.description: Free-form text pertinent to this document, conveying information that is not contained explicitly in other structures.

TransportUserRemarks.title: Transport Execution Plan Request. Transport User_ Remarks. Text
TransportUserRemarks.description: Remarks from the transport user regarding the transport operations referenced in the Transport Execution Plan Request.

SenderParty.title: Transport Execution Plan Request. Sender_ Party. Party
SenderParty.description: The party sending the Transport Execution Plan Request.

ReceiverParty.title: Transport Execution Plan Request. Receiver_ Party. Party
ReceiverParty.description: The party receiving the Transport Execution Plan Request.

TransportUserParty.title: Transport Execution Plan Request. Transport User_ Party. Party
TransportUserParty.description: The party requesting the transport services referenced in the Transport Execution Plan Request.

TransportServiceProviderParty.title: Transport Execution Plan Request. Transport Service Provider_ Party. Party
TransportServiceProviderParty.description: The party providing the transport services referenced in the Transport Execution Plan Request.

PayeeParty.title: Transport Execution Plan Request. Payee_ Party. Party
PayeeParty.description: The party that will pay for the transport service(s) referred to in a Transport Execution Plan.

Signature.title: Transport Execution Plan Request. Signature
Signature.description: A signature applied to this document.

TransportExecutionPlanDocumentReference.title: Transport Execution Plan Request. Transport Execution Plan_ Document Reference. Document Reference
TransportExecutionPlanDocumentReference.description: A reference to an original Transport Execution Plan Document.

TransportServiceDescriptionDocumentRefer.title: Transport Execution Plan Request. Transport Service Description_ Document Reference. Document Reference
TransportServiceDescriptionDocumentRefer.description: A reference to the Transport Service Description, which is used by a transport service provider to announce transport services to transport users (buyers).

AdditionalDocumentReference.title: Transport Execution Plan Request. Additional_ Document Reference. Document Reference
AdditionalDocumentReference.description: A reference to an additional document associated with this document.

TransportContract.title: Transport Execution Plan Request. Transport_ Contract. Contract
TransportContract.description: A potential contract related to the Transport Execution Plan Request.

TransportServiceProviderResponseDeadline.title: Transport Execution Plan Request. Transport Service Provider Response Deadline_ Period. Period
TransportServiceProviderResponseDeadline.description: A deadline for a response from the Transport Service Provider to this Transport Execution Plan Request.

MainTransportationService.title: Transport Execution Plan Request. Main_ Transportation Service. Transportation Service
MainTransportationService.description: A description of the main transportation service referenced in the Transport Execution Plan Request.

AdditionalTransportationService.title: Transport Execution Plan Request. Additional_ Transportation Service. Transportation Service
AdditionalTransportationService.description: A description of an additional transportation service referenced in the Transport Execution Plan Request.

ServiceStartTimePeriod.title: Transport Execution Plan Request. Service Start Time_ Period. Period
ServiceStartTimePeriod.description: The period within which the services referred to in the Transport Execution Plan Request must begin.

ServiceEndTimePeriod.title: Transport Execution Plan Request. Service End Time_ Period. Period
ServiceEndTimePeriod.description: The period during which the services referred to in the Transport Execution Plan Request must be completed.

FromLocation.title: Transport Execution Plan Request. From_ Location. Location
FromLocation.description: The location of origin of the transport service referenced in the Transport Execution Plan Request.

ToLocation.title: Transport Execution Plan Request. To_ Location. Location
ToLocation.description: The destination location for the transport service referenced in the Transport Execution Plan Request.

AtLocation.title: Transport Execution Plan Request. At_ Location. Location
AtLocation.description: The location of a transport service (e.g., terminal handling service) that does not require transport movement.

TransportExecutionTerms.title: Transport Execution Plan Request. Transport Execution Terms
TransportExecutionTerms.description: A description of terms and conditions related to the Transport Execution Plan Request.

Consignment.title: Transport Execution Plan Request. Consignment
Consignment.description: A description of an identifiable collection of goods items to be transported between the consignor and the consignee. This information may be defined within a transport contract. A consignment may comprise more than one shipment (e.g., when consolidated by a freight forwarder).
